desc: 味方単体の状態異常をすべて治療する

dictionary.lore: A potion distributed by the Akras Summoners’ Hall. An extremely precious potion that heals all abnormalities instantaneously. Due to its versatility, many have entreated the Summoners’ Hall to distribute it to regular Summoners as well, but the Hall continues to refuse on the grounds that it is “potentially dangerous when misused”.

name: 浄化薬
